msg: Update beta-2 release notes for the most recent changes.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the Location entity declaration in struts-config_1_0.dtd

author: craigmcc
msg: Update to reflect the changes in BeanUtils.  No functionality changes.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update to the current versions from the Commons Beanutils project.  After
Struts 1.0 final, Struts will be modified to use the Commons packages
directly.  This update also fixes two outstanding bug reports:
PR: Bugzilla #1200 - access to public methods defined in nested interfaces
PR: Bugzilla #1785 - misleading exception when "bean" is null

author: craigmcc
msg: Update to current versions from the Commons Collections project.  After
1.0 final, Struts will be modified to use the Commons classes directly.
